Files Created in ##TEST_PATH##:
Using: ##SOURCE_PATH##/mumps -run GDE
mumps.gld
Using: ##SOURCE_PATH##/mupip
mumps.dat
###################################################################
;trigger name: a#1 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 1
+^a -commands=S -xecute=<<
diskio
	do ^echoline
	write !,"DISK TEST",!!
	set a="dfile.out"
	open a:newfile
	use a
	set string=":23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
	for i=0:1:9 write i,string,!
	use $p		
	use a:rewind
	for i=0:1:9 read ^inp use $p write ^inp,! use a
	close a
	do ^echoline
	quit
>>
;trigger name: b#1 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 1
+^b -commands=S -xecute=<<
fifoio
	do ^echoline
	write !,"FIFO TEST",!!
	set fif="fifo1"
	open fif:(fifo:newversion)
	zsystem "cat ./dfile.out > fifo1"
	use fif
	for i=0:1:9 read ^inp2 use $p write ^inp2,! use fif
	close fif
	do ^echoline
	quit
>>
;trigger name: c#1 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 1
+^c -commands=S -xecute=<<
pipeio
	do ^echoline
	write !,"PIPE TEST",!!
	set pdev="pipe1"
	open pdev:(command="cat ./dfile.out":readonly)::"pipe"
	use pdev
	for i=0:1:10 read ^inp3 quit:$zeof  use $p write ^inp3,! use pdev
	close pdev
	do ^echoline
	quit
>>
;trigger name: relay#1 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("open") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	do ^echoline
	set file="relay.outx"
	open file:newversion
	ztrigger ^relay("use")
	zwrite ^relay
	do ^echoline
>>
;trigger name: relay#2 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("use") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	set file="relay.outx"
	use file
	ztrigger ^relay("write")
>>
;trigger name: relay#3 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("write") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	set file="relay.outx"
	set string=":23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
	write file,!
	for i=0:1:9 write i,string,!
	ztrigger ^relay("rewind")
	ztrigger ^relay("close")
>>
;trigger name: relay#4 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("rewind") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	set file="relay.outx"
	use file:rewind
	ztrigger ^relay("read")
>>
;trigger name: relay#5 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("read") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	set file="relay.outx"
	for i=0:1:9 read ^relay(i)
	quit
>>
;trigger name: relay#6 (region DEFAULT)  cycle: 6
+^relay("close") -commands=ZTR -xecute=<<
	set file="relay.outx"
	close file
>>
###################################################################

Outside of the triggers:
Expect ^inp3 to be null as we let it read to end of file
^inp=9:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789
^inp2=9:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789
^inp3=
###################################################################
###################################################################
^relay(0)="relay.outx"
^relay(1)="0:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
^relay(2)="1:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
^relay(3)="2:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
^relay(4)="3:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
^relay(5)="4:23456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789"
